name: tm65
effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Claw to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user slashes with a sharp claw
made from shadows. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.
